Target: those who were behind the military coup in Venezuela
Polar_expression: wanted to have Venezuela come out from the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries ( OPEC )

text: Referring to the objective of those who were behind the military coup in Venezuela , Chavez said they wwanted to have Venezuela come out from the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries ( OPEC ) and therefore tried to produce more oil in order to undermine the organization .
